actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1516 (Part I).
Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8 of Public Law 93-233 to permit California to continue cash payments to SSI recipients in lieu of food stamps.

summary.as: Reported to House amended, Part I
summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1516 (Part I)) Specifies conditions under which a State is authorized to continue cash payments in lieu of food stamps to SSI (Supplemental Security Income) recipients, but prohibits additional cash payments for any month beginning before October 1, 1978, or ending after September 30, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8 of Public Law 93-233 to permit California to continue cash payments to SSI recipients in lieu of food stamps.
